title: vighna vinAyaka
sahitya:
vighna vinAyaka mUrtikku mangaLam vEzhamukhamODu tavazh


anupallavi

  agni vaitta neTrik-kaNNanum Adi parAshakti annaiyum en maghan
 en maghan enru maDi vaittuk konji viLaiyADum anju kara bAla


caraNam    oru paghaiyillAda uttama deivam umbar munivar paNi gaNapati deivam
viri carAcarAdi mUlamAi miLir vidhi viSNu shivAkAramAi oLir
